data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of El Oued, Algeria who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of El Oued, Algeria

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in El Oued, Algeria to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of El Oued to exponentially multiply disciples.
Father, bring yourself glory in El Oued. Through your servants plant 26 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Bedouin, Ruarha people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Jesus, please give your people in El Oued, Algeria a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 134,597 who are far from you in El Oued, Algeria from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.section_summary:
the state of El Oued, Algeria has a population of 134,700.

We estimate El Oued has 92 people who might know Jesus, 11 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 134,597 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 1,464 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of El Oued, Algeria. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.
